title: Why Ridley Scott Thinks Aliens Are Real
text:
Why Ridley Scott Thinks Aliens Are Real 
Published By: CinemaBlend.com - Today 
As a filmmaker, Sir Ridley Scott is responsible for introducing the world to perhaps the most terrifying movie extraterrestrial of all time,...
